title: garen slow on q ? since when ?
body:
garen slow on q ? since when ?

garen was one of the strongest champs....and now made even stronger with slow on q
made a brainless champ more brainless

riot....u r insane

German board here. but Garen Q does not slow the enemy, are you sure he hasnt any items like {{item:3800}} or {{item:3143}}
